TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Structure TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime Implements IDeserializationCallback, IEquatable(Of TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime), ISerializable
type TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime = struct interface IDeserializationCallback interface ISerializable

summary.span: 提供有关特定时区中特定时间更改（例如从夏时制更改为标准时间，或者从标准时间更改为夏时制）的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a specific time change, such as the change from daylight saving time to standard time or vice versa, in a particular time zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用结构，以指示何时发生从标准时间到夏时制，或从夏时制回标准时间转换。You can use the structure to indicate when a transition from standard time to daylight saving time, or from daylight saving time back to standard time, occurs. 此结构支持固定日期规则和浮动日期规则。This structure supports both fixed-date rules and floating-date rules. 使用固定日期规则的 （例如凌晨 2:00 特定月特定天的时间转换Use fixed-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 11 月 3日日）。on November 3). （例如凌晨 2:00 特定月份的特定一周的某一特定日期发生的时间转换，使用浮动日期规则Use floating-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 年 11 月的第一个星期日）。on the first Sunday of November). 下表比较了固定日期和浮动日期转换中使用的属性：The following table compares the properties used in fixed-date and floating-date transitions: ||月份Month|周Week|天Day|时间Time| |-|-----------|----------|---------|----------| |固定日期规则Fixed-date rule||不可用N/A||| |浮动日期规则Floating-date rule||||| 固定日期和浮动日期转换属性获取发生时间更改的时间。For both fixed-date and floating-date transitions, the property gets the time at which the time change occurs. 对于从标准为夏时制的转换，这是时区的标准时间值。For transitions from standard to daylight saving time, this is the time zone's standard time value. 对于从标准时间到夏时制的转换，这是时区的夏时制值。For transitions from daylight saving to standard time, this is the time zone's daylight saving time value. 这是值的日期组件已被忽略; 其年、 月和日值必须始终为 1。This is a value whose date component is ignored; its year, month, and day value must always equal 1. > [!NOTE] > 实例结构是固定不变。An instance of the structure is immutable. 一旦已创建一个对象，不能修改其值。Once an object has been created, its values cannot be modified. 一个可以通过调用创建对象`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)和分别创建固定或浮动日期规则的方法。A object can be created by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods to create a fixed or floating-date rule, respectively. 起始和结束对象随后会作为参数提供方法来创建包含此转换的时间信息的新调整规则。The starting and ending objects are then supplied as parameters to the method to create a new adjustment rule that includes this transition time information. 并的属性对象返回对象。The and properties of an object return a object.

summary.span: 定义一个使用固定日期规则的日期更改（即，发生在特定月份的特定日期的时间更改）。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建的固定日期规则 （即，时间更改发生在特定月特定日期）。This method creates a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month). 例如，始终出现在年 10 月 28 日的时间更改遵循固定日期规则。For example, a time change that always occurs on October 28 follows a fixed-date rule. 从标准时间转换为夏时制，`timeOfDay`参数表示的时间的时区的标准时间转换。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于标准时间到夏时制转换，它表示时区的夏令时中的转换的时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 请注意，这是的年、 月和日期值必须全部等于 1 的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下面的示例使用固定日期规则和浮动日期规则创建虚构时区的时区的转换。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 固定日期规则定义了时区调整始于凌晨 2:00The fixed-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 在 3 月 15 日和结束于凌晨 3:00。on March 15 and ends at 3:00 A.M. 在 11 月 15日日到 1955 1900 年。on November 15 for the years 1900 to 1955. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

summary.span: 定义一个使用浮动日期规则的日期更改（即，发生在特定月份的特定星期的特定星期几的时间更改）。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建浮动日期规则 （即，发生在特定日期的特定月特定星期的时间更改）。This method creates a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month). 例如，年 10 月的最后一个星期日发生时间更改遵循浮动日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs on the last Sunday of October follows a floating-date rule. 从标准时间转换为夏时制，`timeOfDay`参数表示的时间的时区的标准时间转换。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于标准时间到夏时制转换，它表示时区的夏令时中的转换的时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 请注意，这是的年、 月和日期值必须全部等于 1 的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下面的示例使用固定日期规则和浮动日期规则创建虚构时区的时区的转换。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 浮动日期规则定义了时区调整始于凌晨 2:00The floating-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 在 3 月的最后一个星期日凌晨 3:00 结束on the last Sunday of March and ends at 3:00 A.M. 在 1956 年以后的 10 月的第四个星期日。on the fourth Sunday in October for the years 1956 onward. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取发生时间更改的日期。

span.span: Gets the day on which the time change occurs.
The day on which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回有效的值才属性是`true`。The property returns a valid value only if the property is `true`. 属性值对应的值`day`参数的方法。The property value corresponds to the value of the `day` parameter of the method. 如果其值大于过渡的月份中的天数，转换发生在该月的最后一天。If its value is greater than the number of days in the month of the transition, the transition occurs on the last day of the month. 属性指示 （例如，4 月 15 日） 对其应用固定日期规则每月天数。The property indicates the day of the month on which a fixed-date rule is applied (for example, April 15). 与此相反，属性指示日期是星期几的浮动日期规则对其应用 （例如，年 11 月的第二个星期日）。In contrast, the property indicates the day of the week on which a floating-date rule is applied (for example, the second Sunday of November). ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示的所有固定日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all fixed-date transitions. 时间信息包括时间更改发生的一天。The time information includes the day on which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回有效的值才属性是`false`。The property returns a valid value only if the property is `false`. 属性指示日期是星期几的浮动日期规则对其应用 （例如，年 11 月的第二个星期日）。The property indicates the day of the week on which a floating-date rule is applied (for example, the second Sunday of November). 与此相反，属性指示 （例如，4 月 15 日） 对其应用固定日期规则每月天数。In contrast, the property indicates the day of the month on which a fixed-date rule is applied (for example, April 15). ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示的所有浮动日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 时间信息包括发生时间更改星期几。The time information includes the day of the week on which the time change occurs. .property instance bool IsFixedDateRule
Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedDateRule As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedDateRule { bool get(); };
member this.IsFixedDateRule : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是在固定日期和时间（如 11 月 1 日）还是在浮动日期和时间（如 10 月的最后一个星期日）发生时间更改。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the time change occurs at a fixed date and time (such as November 1) or a floating date and time (such as the last Sunday of October).

value.span: 如果时间更改规则为固定日期，则为 ；如果时间更改规则为浮动日期，则为 。

span.span: if the time change rule is fixed-date; if the time change rule is floating-date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定日期规则指示转换发生在相同的日期和时间的调整规则将应用到每年。A fixed-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on the same date and time of each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如，发生每年 11 月 3 的时间更改遵循固定日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs every November 3 follows a fixed-date rule. 浮动日期规则指示调整规则应用到每年的特定月份的特定一周的某一特定日期发生转换。A floating-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month for each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如，年 11 月的第一个星期日发生时间更改遵循浮动日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs on the first Sunday of November follows a floating-date rule. 值属性确定的哪些属性对象具有有效的值。The value of the property determines which properties of a object have valid values. 下表指示哪些属性的值受到属性。The following table indicates which properties are affected by the value of the property. |TransitionTime 属性TransitionTime property|IsFixedDateRule = trueIsFixedDateRule = true|IsFixedDateRule = falseIsFixedDateRule = false| |-----------------------------|-----------------------------|------------------------------| |`Day`|有效Valid|未使用Unused| |`DayOfWeek`|未使用Unused|有效Valid| |`Week`|未使用Unused|有效Valid| |`Month`|有效Valid|有效Valid| |`TimeOfDay`|有效Valid|有效Valid| ## Examples 下面的示例列出了可在本地系统的所有时区的过渡时间与夏时制。The following example lists the transition times to and from daylight saving time for all time zones that are available on the local system. 对于使用固定日期规则的时区，会显示的属性转换时间信息对象。For time zones with fixed-date rules, it displays transition time information from the properties of the object. 对于不包含固定日期规则的时区，它使用对象，表示当前的系统日历，以确定该转换的实际的开始和结束日期。For time zones without fixed-date rules, it uses a object that represents the current system calendar to determine the actual start and end dates of the transition. 该示例向控制台显示结果。The example displays the results to the console. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/example1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/example1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个对象是否相等，如果它们具有相同的值为每个其 6 个属性。Two objects are equal if they have identical values for each of their six properties. 否则，它们不相等。Otherwise, they are unequal. 此运算符的等效方法是。The equivalent method for this operator is .

summary.span: 获取发生时间更改的小时、分钟和秒。

span.span: Gets the hour, minute, and second at which the time change occurs.

value.span: 发生时间更改的当天的时间。

span.span: The time of day at which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从标准时间转换为夏时制，值表示的时间的时区的标准时间转换。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the value represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于标准时间到夏时制转换，它表示时区的夏令时中的转换的时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 属性定义仅更改的时间，而不是其日期的时间。The property defines only the time of a time change, but not its date. 由日期并属性的固定规则更改，并通过， ，和浮动规则更改的属性。The date is determined by the and properties for fixed-rule changes, and by the , , and properties for floating-rule changes. 此日期部分值将被忽略; 的年、 月和日的值始终为 1。The date component of this value is ignored; the value of the year, month, and day is always 1. 属性使用的固定日期和浮动日期转换。The property is used for both fixed-date and floating-date transitions. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示具有调整规则的这些时间范围的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for those time zones that have adjustment rules. 时间信息包括发生时间更改的时间。The time information includes the time of day at which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#6)]

.property instance int32 Week
Public ReadOnly Property Week As Integer
public: property int Week { int get(); };
member this.Week : int

summary.span: 获取时间更改发生在月中的第几个星期。

span.span: Gets the week of the month in which a time change occurs.

value.span: 时间更改发生在月中的第几个星期。

span.span: The week of the month in which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性仅用于使用浮动日期规则的时间更改。The value of the property is used only for time changes with floating-date rules. 有效的值的范围是从 1 到 5。Valid values can range from 1 to 5. 属性定义发生时间更改的月份。The property defines the month in which the time change occurs. 属性确定转换发生在其一周。The property determines the week on which the transition occurs. 属性定义在转换发生星期几。The property defines the day of the week on which the transition occurs. 值属性确定以下表中所示。The value of the property is determined as shown in the following table. |如果一周属性值为If the Week property value is|发生转换The transition occurs on| |-----------------------------------|------------------------------| |11|第一个匹配项中的值。The first occurrence of the value in .| |22|第二个匹配项中的值。The second occurrence of the value in .| |33|第三个匹配项中的值。The third occurrence of the value in .| |44|第四个匹配项中的值。The fourth occurrence of the value in .| |55|最后一个匹配项中的值。The last occurrence of the value in .| 例如，如果转换发生在 3 月的值的第一个星期日属性为 1。For example, if a transition occurs on the first Sunday of March, the value of the property is 1. 如果它发生在年 3 月的值的最后一个星期日属性为 5。If it occurs on the last Sunday of March, the value of the property is 5. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示的所有浮动日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 时间信息包括在其中发生时间更改的月份的一周。The time information includes the week of the month in which the time change occurs. 该示例还定义了`WeekOfMonth`枚举，以显示一个字符串，表示的序数值属性而不是整数。The example also defines a `WeekOfMonth` enumeration to display a string that represents the ordinal value of the property rather than an integer. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]
